#!/bin/bash
DATE=$(date +%d-%m-%Y)
DB_USER="phpe2122g1"
DB_PASSWORD="phpe2122g1@22@ago"
DB="phpe2122g1"

mkdir $DATE

mysqldump --force --skip-lock-tables -u $DB_USER -h 3.89.36.150 $DB --password=$DB_PASSWORD >> $DATE/db_backup.sql

find ./* -type d -mtime +30 -exec rm {} \;

git add .
git commit -m $DATE
git push

git config --global user.signingkey 'ssh-rsa  denize.f.bassi@gmail.com'
